summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley between Blocks 11 and 12, The University Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue Northeast and 7th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 90074 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
